page.content: {The library}is situated in the centre of Clydebank,next to the{Town {Hall. {The library}was opened in{1913}with the record section opening in 1969 and the video section in 1982.At present the library has approximately{12,000 {members}and it is staffed by 14 librarians,7 of whom are part-time.As well as the lending of books,the library has several other facilities such as video,record and cassette lending,a reference and study section, a local studies collection,the local museum,a house bound service,an information service and a photocopying service,all for use within the Clydebank area. {The library}also contains a large historical information section which includes:- a complete file of the Clydebank Press from 1891 to date,a
